title: Yervand Krbachyan
text: Yervand Mesropi Krbachyan (, born 1 October 1971) is an <a href="Armenians">Armenian</a> former <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="Defender%20%28association%20football%29">defender</a> and current manager. He was also capped for the USSR U-20 team at the <a href="1991%20FIFA%20World%20Youth%20Championship">1991 FIFA World Youth Championship</a>.
